responsibilities: Unload shipments from incoming trucks and sign paperwork upon receipt
Accurately complete store-to-store and store-to-distribution center deliveries daily
Receive and allocate products to their designated place
Inspect contents to ensure they are undamaged
Verify packages according to invoices (quantity, quality, price, etc.)
Communicate to management when a mistake is identified
Ensure all warehouse products have proper locations in the inventory management system
Update the inventory system regularly with new product as required
Maintain a safe and clean work environment
Work together with all team members to meet and exceed store objectives

responsibilities: Report to Marina Management and discuss daily activities that require attention

Complete other duties as assigned by management
